short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Cantonese pronunciation (Jyutping) on Chinese characters.
short.ja: 漢字に広東語の発音（粤拼）を付けます。
short.zh_CN: 为汉字标注粤语发音（粤拼）。
short.zh_TW: 為漢字標註粵語發音（粵拼）。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
幫網頁漢字自動標註粵拼（香港語言學學會粵語拼音方案），學習粵拼同粵語嘅強大工具。

Annotate Jyutping (standard Cantonese romanization) for Chinese characters on web pages. A powerful tool for learning Cantonese. 

本程序開源喺 GitHub: https://github.com/CanCLID/inject-jyutping
This add-on is open-sourced on GitHub: https://github.com/CanCLID/inject-jyutping

**有任何意見反饋歡迎發郵件到 support@jyutping.org
**Please send any feedback to support@jyutping.org

注意：自從 2021年開始，Google Doc 改用基於 canvas 嘅渲染方式，呢個改動導致咗本程式無法獲取 Google Doc 入面嘅文本，所以冇辦法繼續同 Google Doc 入面嘅漢字標註粵拼，對此我哋都無能為力。詳情請見：https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html

Note: Since 2021, Google Doc has changed to canvas-based rendering, meaning this extension can no longer access the text data within Google Doc, therefore unable to annotate Jyutping to the characters in Google Docs any more. There is nothing we can do about it. More details in: https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html
long.ja:
ウェブページの漢字に粵拼（広東語のローマ字表記）を付けます。広東語学習のための強力なツールです。

発音データの出典は rime-cantonese です。https://github.com/rime/rime-cantonese

現時点ではまだ発音に誤りや間違いがあるかもしれません。エラーを見つけた場合は、収集してフィードバックメールに送信してください。support@jyutping.org

このアドオンはGitHubでオープンソースです。https://github.com/CanCLID/inject-jyutping
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:

Annotate Jyutping (standard Cantonese romanization) for Chinese characters on web pages. A powerful tool for learning Cantonese.

本程序開源喺 GitHub: https://github.com/CanCLID/inject-jyutping
This add-on is open-sourced on GitHub: https://github.com/CanCLID/inject-jyutping

**有任何意見反饋歡迎發郵件到 support@jyutping.org
**Please send any feedback to support@jyutping.org

注意：自從 2021年開始，Google Doc 改用基於 canvas 嘅渲染方式，呢個改動導致咗本程式無法獲取 Google Doc 入面嘅文本，所以冇辦法繼續同 Google Doc 入面嘅漢字標註粵拼，對此我哋都無能為力。詳情請見：https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html

Note: Since 2021, Google Doc has changed to canvas-based rendering, meaning this extension can no longer access the text data within Google Doc, therefore unable to annotate Jyutping to the characters in Google Docs any more. There is nothing we can do about it. More details in: https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html
